Translations.Text: inkara karanara'o'e kahyum ke jyare ame mati tha'i ja'isum ane amara purvajo pana, sum amane phari jivita karavamam avase
amane ane amara purvajone pahelathi ja ava vacano apavamam avi rahya che. A to phakta agalana lokoni varta'o sivaya kami nathi
kahi do, ke dharatimam haripharine ju'o to khara ke aparadhi'oni dasa kevi tha'i
tame temana mate nirasa na thaso ane temani yukti'othi potana hrdayane tanga na karaso
kahe che ke a vacano kyare pura thase? Jo saca hova to janavo
javaba api do ke kadaca ketalika te vastu, jena mate tame utavala kari rahya cho, tamarathi ghani najika hoya
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara dareka loko mate khuba ja krpalu che, parantu ghana loko krtaghnata kare che
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara te vastu'one pana jane che, je vatone te'ona hrdaya chupavi rahya che ane jene jahera kare che
akasa ane dharatini ko'i chupi vastu evi nathi, je spasta khulli kitabamam na hoya
ni:Sanka a kura'ana, isra'ilana santana same te ghani vatonum varnana kare che, jemam a loko vivada kare che
ane a kura'ana, imanavala'o mate kharekhara satya margadarsana ane krpa che
tamaro palanahara temani vacce potana adesa vade badha phensala kari dese, te ghano ja pratisthita, jnanavalo che
basa! Tame allaha para ja bharoso rakho, ni:Sanka tame saca ane spasta dina para cho
ni:Sanka tame na to mrtakone sambhalavi sako cho ane na to bahera'one potano avaja sambhalavi sako cho, jyare te loko pitha pheravi pacha phare che
Ane na tame andhala'one temani pathabhrastatathi hatavi margadarsana api sako cho, tame to te lokone ja sambhalavi sako cho, je amari ayato para imana lavya che, pachi te loko ajnakari bani jaya che
jyare temana para yatana nakki tha'i jase, ame dharati manthi temana mate eka janavara kadhisum, je temani sathe vato karatum hase, ke loko amari ayato para visvasa karata na hatam
